Preference.android:title: Howto: Example-Designs
Preference.android:summary:
Download your desired designs here. 
They will be installed on your sdcard. 
 
Using them is super easy: 
-> Go back to the main screen of this App 
->Swipe from the left to open the drawer with your designs 
->Select a design 
->Done! :-)
